summary: Just 3 presets of some of my characters
descriptionHtml:
Just a file containing 3 of my character's as presets. The presets are Storm, Cris and Mist.

To get them looking exactly as they do in the screenshots you'll need to do the following:

Storm:

[list]
[*]Install the Lunari race
[*]Install Apachii Skyhair
[*]Navigate to the Lunari race's texture folder (would be under skyrim/data/textures/bhakti) and install the UNP textures (this only works with bodys that use UNP as a base.)
[/list]
Cris:
[list]
[*]Install the Epic Elves mod by zzjy
[*]Install the SG hair pack (Can be found in the first reply in this [url=https://www.reddit.com/r/skyrimmods/comments/41dy1p/does_anyone_have_sg_hair_pack_350/]link[/url]﻿)
[/list]
Mist:
[list]
[*]Install the Valkyrie Race
[*]navigate to or create the Valkyrie race texture folder (skyrim/data/textures/actors/character_valkyrie/female) and install Fair Skin complexion (works with both CBBE and UNP) 
[*]

[/list]I use the sevenbase bombshell body on my characters however due to them all having their own unique install folders you can have a different body type on each one. Additionally the armour in the screenshots is either from The Amazing World of Bikini Armor mod (found [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/83383]here[/url]﻿) and the Bikini Ascend armor (found [url=http://mod.dysintropi.me/nisetanaka/]here[/url]﻿.)

Don't bother trying endorse I've disabled them as I don't feel that these are worthy of endorsements.

credits:

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2950481]expired6978[/url] for RaceMenu

author: Kpnut
